org.encog.examples.neural.gui.ocr

Class SampleData

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.encog.examples.neural.gui.ocr.SampleData
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, Comparable<SampleData>

    public class SampleData
extends Object
implements Comparable<SampleData>, Cloneable
    SampleData: Holds sampled data that will be used to train the neural network.
